agenda_items.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of the 47th BWC Meeting
agenda_items.details: The draft minutes of the 47th BWC meeting held on 07th September 2021 were circulated to all members. The BWC confirmed the minutes as no comments were received.

agenda_items.title: Construction of Proposed Lecture Hall Complex (Ground Floor with Future Provision of G+2)
agenda_items.details: BWC approved the proposal and recommended placing it before the FC and BoG for Administrative Approval and Expenditure Sanction. Additional funds beyond Ministry sanction to be borne by Institute grant/IRG. CPWD may suggest modifications.

agenda_items.title: Construction of Partition Wall and Repairing of Water Supply & Sanitary Items for Chemical Engineering Department (Old Library Building)
agenda_items.details: BWC approved and confirmed Technical Sanction, Administrative Approval, and Expenditure Sanction.
